thread.section_title: Government Policy, Business and Technology: i360 Gov
thread.title: 10 smart cities to watch

title: 10 smart cities to watch
text:
02 10 smart cities to watch 
Statescoop: Cities across the country (and the world) are turning to technology to better connect their communities, improve citizen services, and perhaps most of all, find more intelligent ways to manage their resources.A closer look at the evolution of “smart cities” reveals a rising tide of innovation in cities large and small across the U.S., as StateScoop reported this week (See Cities of the future: The big shift to ‘Smart’) — and a range of approaches.
